author: Marina Pitofsky
title: US coronavirus deaths hits record one-day total of 4,591
description: Thursday marked a new record for coronavirus deaths in the U.S., with 4,591 people dying from the virus in just 24 hours.The prior record was 2,569 deaths in the U.S. Wednesday,...
content:
Thursday marked a new record for coronavirus deaths in the U.S., with 4,591 people dying from the virus in just 24 hours.
The prior record was 2,569 deaths in the U.S. Wednesday, according to a Wall Street Journal analysis of data from Johns Hopkins Universi… [+1296 chars]
